fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to sing a carol to one player during the night. (3 use, do not lose a use if ability fails)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target does not visit another player, they will receive a list of three names. One of these names will be evil. If they visit another player, your ability will fail.
- You may sing yourself a carol once, and this will count as a use of your ability.
